entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: "*App*" wildcard for [UnsafeAccessor] assembly name #106216
    Future
  • ILLink keeps members of pointer/byref types for DynamicallyAccessedMembers #106214
  • System.Linq.Expressions.Tests.OpAssign.AssignmentEquivalentsWithMemberAccess causing crash #106207
  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.IOCompletionPortCountConfigVarTest failure - time out, unexpected exit code #106206
  • [API Proposal]: Add FromFile method to BinaryData #106203
  • [browser][jiterp] possibly wrong code for jitcall trampolines #106200
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel long-running operation base type `OperationResult` #106197
  • PosixSignalRegistration.Create hangs debugger on MacOS (Rider & VSCode) #106194
  • [browser] memory leaks #106189
    10.0.0
  • `gtTreeHasSideEffects` handles `GT_INTRINSIC` incorrectly #106187
  • ARM-SVE: AddSequentialAcross() is defined incorrectly #106180
    9.0.0
  • [mono] thread not been gc when method execute end. #106176

Closed

  • Port System.Runtime.InteropServices docs for .NET 9 APIs #105986
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics.LastValue looks like it could experience torn reads #91591
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed ''targetReg != embMaskOp1Reg'' during 'Generate code' #106124
    9.0.0
  • BEGIN_ILLINK_FEATURE_SWITCH mechanism for corelib.h does not work with checked/debug runtime and a trimmed app #55950
    10.0.0
  • Race condition during TraceSource Initialization/Refresh #104457
    9.0.0
  • Invalid suppression in `TypeConverter` when loading a custom converter type #95265
    9.0.0
  • BadImageFormatException when calling static virtual method in interface #82217
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(intrinsicInfo.numArgs == -1) || (sig->numArgs == static_cast<uint8_t>(intrinsicInfo.numArgs))' during 'Morph - Inlining' (IL size 568; hash 0xb #105922
    9.0.0
  • Implement real fix for C5271 in IJW test build #92879
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.Tests.Perf.** and System.Perf.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89243
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.Memory.Span.** and System.Memory.ReadOnly.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89247
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.Text.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89242
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.IO.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89249
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.Globalization.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89250
    9.0.0
  • [perf] System.Collections.** and System.Buffers.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89251
    9.0.0
  • MSB3026 because System.Drawing.csproj is being built multiple times #106195
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates code that doesn't compile when using StringValues #94547
    9.0.0
  • [perf] Microsoft.Extensions** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89252
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] 7.0 -> 8.0-RC1 Microbenchmark Comparison #91626
    9.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS and WASM disk size regressions on 06 Dec 2022 #79285
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] init_jit_call_info Attempting to JIT compile method - interp.c:2663 #101482
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'insOptsScalableWide(opt)' during 'Generate code' #105720
    9.0.0
  • DEBUGGING IS NOT ENABLED when trying to debug .NET 8 Blazor Web project simulating iOS device on edge #104234
    9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation where caller requires no initialization #82224
    10.0.0
  • [wasm] Unable to use Emscripten ports not in cache #99176
    10.0.0
  • [Apple-mobile] Segfault when retrieving native sort key on apple platforms. #105932
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't keep members of pointer or byref element types #106215
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix Logging formatting with multiple collections #106213
    area-Extensions-Logging, 9.0.0
  • Simplify MethodDesc::GetLoaderModule #106212
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Clean up ILLink logic for "inflating" generic types #106211
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Stop creating map of assembly refs to name for `Module` #106210
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement type name resolution for ILLink analyzer #106209
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] make sure that MonoBundledResource.id is valid #106205
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser][AOT] disable jiterp for jitcall trampolines #106202
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `GatherVectorWithByteOffsetFirstFaulting` #106199
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] JitDisasmWithGC: Output any delta in GC info #106196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mention ILVerification breaking change in ILVerification package release notes #106193
    area-ILVerification
  • Small tunning for write-barrier on arm64 #106191
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle peeling cns + cns patterns more robustly #106190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix `gtNodeHasSideEffects` checking call arguments #106185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Add checks for MOVPRFX sequencing (#105514) #106184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Teach middle-end liveness to DCE dead calls without sideeffects #106183
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Shuffle MethodTable flags #106182
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add dispose() to Bitmap obj #106181
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix UseCompilerGeneratedDocXmlFile default value #106179
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Remove two outdated test inputs from regex match timeout tests #106174
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Avoid package dependencies on libraries in the shared framework #106172
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Switch build x64 image to Azure Linux 3.0 #106170
    needs-area-label
  • Implementation of SOSDacApi GetMethodDescName for cDAC #106169
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [GC] Handle growing global_regions_to_decommit lists #106168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add `DebuggerHidden` to managed JitHelpers #106167
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Cache the path on `Module` for easier diagnostics #106103
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add new API docs for System.Runtime.InteropServices #106208
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix concurrency issue with metrics gauge value collection #106175
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Enable Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask() to take both operands as zero #106130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #105853
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0
  • Implement support for BEGIN/END_ILLINK_FEATURE_SWITCH in CoreLib/EE interface validation #106151
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix threading issue during TraceSource initialization #106192
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add script to aot HelloWorld sample app #106204
    documentation, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Mention GitHub users when the issue/PR binaryformatter-migration label is added #106171
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Make Config generator test only for down-casts #106145
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • JIT: HW intrinsics with a 'this' parameter are illegal #106173
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix C5271 warning in IJW tests #106153
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix resourcemanagement.yml for os-ios, os-android etc #106198
    needs-area-label
  • Add os-ios, os-android etc labels to area section in resourceManagement.yml #106082
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][interp] Revert short branch removal #106178
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Allow browser runtime build to use custom cache path #106188
    area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] System.Console CancelKeyPressTests.ExitDetectionNotBlockedByHandler increase timeout #106119
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix opt value for an embedded intrinsic in ConditionalSelect (#105720) #105803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger #105559
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Delete superfluous CanGetUnflushedBytes check in Serialize #106163
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [RISC-V] Fix Reg Order for Float Registers #105930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Fix overriding emscripten cache #106177
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Use the right env variable in mono.proj for frozen cache #106150
    area-Build-mono
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Handle small buffer case in sortkey #106062
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [NativeAOT] Emit Align8 flag for thread statics #105931
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consider methods returning constants same as substitutions #105878
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add WebSocket Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout (minimal) implementation #105841
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Fix config binding with records having collection constructor parameter #106158
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Add some basic guidelines around using C++ standard headers now that our build allows us to #101088
    documentation, area-Meta

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2512415 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • make Select_LargeNumber_Succcess exclusive #105751
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT: Model GetFfr* with a special side effect and handle it in VN #105973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Fix IntelliSense for gc.cpp #105768
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix infinite loop in foregroundgc test #106006
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Synthesize a valid ECMA-335 image for read/write metadata instead of providing a separate metadata reader #106164
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Ensure that aggregation is consistent regardless of data alignment #106166
    area-System.Numerics
  • [System.Text.Json] Improve error handling of ref structs, including collection types with ref struct elements. #106083
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Inject IJW Copy Constructor calls in the JIT instead of in the IL stubs #106000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Pass FP struct fields at arbitrary offsets in ArgIterator and CallDescrWorker #105800
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Add GetKeyedService overload with Type #105860
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [EventPipe] Block eventpipe delete provider for pending callbacks #106156
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Ensure MOVPRFX is next to SVE instruction in imm tables #106125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve, 9.0.0
  • Ensure XML doc comments exist for the nested classes and IsSupported properties for intrinsics #106091
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Arm64/Sve: DelayfreeUses for FMLA should take into account CndSel for RMW #105541
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove BinaryReader and BinaryWriter references from ZipArchive #103153
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix a nested-externs warning in mono #104817
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • Only run AVX512 tests on CPUs that support it (Windows) #106161
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consume the existing instruction metadata when validating expected memory size #106090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip putting patches in certain stubs to prevent crashing on step-in on M1 with JMC disabled #106105
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add memory barriers to native AOT asm helpers #106004
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Disable robust mutexes in PAL on Qemu #106123
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: add test coverage for *Faulting* cases to make sure inactive lanes are zeroed out (#105580) #106139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert.FromHexString exception with too large buffer #105426
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Removes the outer loop for CountBy #106111
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix NativeAOT runtime build without FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #106157
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Test llvm bump #105867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
